section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.

"Carrier" means a person that is:
an insurer that holds a certificate of authority in the State and provides health insurance in the State;
a health maintenance organization that holds a certificate of authority to operate in the State; or
a nonprofit health service plan that holds a certificate of authority to operate in the State.

"Health coverage" means any of the following:
a health insurance contract that is issued or delivered in the State by an insurer;
a contract that is issued or delivered in the State by a nonprofit health service plan; or
a contract that is issued or delivered in the State by a health maintenance organization.
"Health status-related factor" has the meaning stated in § 15-1301 of this article.

"Individual contract" means a contract between a carrier and an individual covering:
the individual;
the individual and the individual's family members; or
the family members of the individual.
"Reunderwrite" means to reevaluate any health status-related factor, occupation, hobby, or activity of an individual for the purpose of:

text.section: A carrier may not reunderwrite an individual for health coverage under an individual contract after the individual contract has been issued.
